@description.body: The default data row renderer.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the focused row should be highlighted.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The owning object

@description.name: @description
@description.body: {String} The ID of the object.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Initializes the colors from the color theme.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: the sum of the vertical insets. This is needed to compute the box model independent size

@description.name: @description
@description.body: borderBottom

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Render the new font and update the table pane content to reflect the font change.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: font {qx.bom.Font} The font to use for the table row
@param.description: The font to use for the table row

@description.name: @description
@description.body: interface implementation

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the row's height CSS style taking the box model into account

@param.name: @param
@param.body: height {Integer} The row's (border-box) height in pixel

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} CSS rule for the row height
@return.description: CSS rule for the row height

@description.name: @description
@description.body: interface implementation

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
rowInfo {Map} A map containing the information about the row to
      update. See {@link #updateDataRowElement} for more information.
@param.description:
A map containing the information about the row to
      update. See {@link #updateDataRowElement} for more information.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Add extra attributes to each row.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
rowInfo {Object}
   The following members are available in rowInfo:
   <dl>
     <dt>table {qx.ui.table.Table}</dt>
     <dd>The table object</dd>
     <dt>styleHeight {Integer}</dt>
     <dd>The height of this (and every) row</dd>
     <dt>row {Integer}</dt>
     <dd>The number of the row being added</dd>
     <dt>selected {Boolean}</dt>
     <dd>Whether the row being added is currently selected</dd>
     <dt>focusedRow {Boolean}</dt>
     <dd>Whether the row being added is currently focused</dd>
     <dt>rowData {Array}</dt>
     <dd>The array row from the data model of the row being added</dd>
   </dl>
@param.description:
The following members are available in rowInfo:
   <dl>
     <dt>table {qx.ui.table.Table}</dt>
     <dd>The table object</dd>
     <dt>styleHeight {Integer}</dt>
     <dd>The height of this (and every) row</dd>
     <dt>row {Integer}</dt>
     <dd>The number of the row being added</dd>
     <dt>selected {Boolean}</dt>
     <dd>Whether the row being added is currently selected</dd>
     <dt>focusedRow {Boolean}</dt>
     <dd>Whether the row being added is currently focused</dd>
     <dt>rowData {Array}</dt>
     <dd>The array row from the data model of the row being added</dd>
   </dl>

@return.name: @return
@return.description:
Any additional attributes and their values that should be added to the
   div tag for the row.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property qxOwner. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxObjectId}.
